meta.title: Davidson Academy | School for Profoundly Gifted - Online & Reno

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: The Davidson Academy is an accredited school for profoundly gifted students with two options: a national, accredited online school, and a public middle & high school in Reno, Nevada.

meta.name: KEYWORDS
meta.content: accredited online school, online high school, online gifted school, online school gifted, public school, public gifted school, high IQ, profoundly gifted middle school, profoundly gifted high school, public high school gifted, public gifted high school, public middle school gifted, public gifted middle school, national online high school, national online high school for gifted students, profoundly gifted students, national online school, national online gifted school, profoundly gifted

div.p: For Profoundly Gifted Middle & High School Students in Reno, NV
Tuition-Based School For Students Living Anywhere In The U.S.
For Profoundly Gifted Middle & High School Students in Reno, NV

h2.strong:
You are unique.
We think your education should be too.

div.p: Unlike traditional school settings, Davidson Academy classes are grouped by ability, not age.

ul.li: Focus on ability, achievement and motivation
Electives designed to meet student interests

div.h2:
So much more
than a school!

div.p: The Davidson Academy offers two options for profoundly gifted students to choose from: a Reno campus for local residents or an online campus for students living anywhere in the U.S. and Canada. Applicants must be in the process of completing 6th grade, at minimum, at the time of application.Apply

The Davidson Academy hosts tours for prospective students and their parents. At these tours, visitors meet current Academy students, parents, faculty and staff, and ask specific questions about the school. Davidson Academy Online is also currently hosting Virtual Open Houses and in-person regional events.

div.title: Read and subscribe to the Davidson Academy eNewsletter

div.p: The Davidson Academy eNewsletter is available online with a new issue published every other month. It features a student column, an instructor profile, and school updates and activities.
Davidson Academy Promotes Academic Excellence in an Online Format

div.h2: What Our Students Have To Say

img.p: "When I first came to the Davidson Academy, I worried about fitting in. I quickly realized that everybody at the Academy, both students and staff members, were, and still are, super friendly. I hope you apply to the Davidson Academy of Nevada. Take it from me; it's an incredible school."

"One of the things I love about the Academy is how the staff is able to accommodate students' interests and needs. Due to the wonderful relationship that the Academy has with the University of Nevada, Reno, every student can take classes at the University geared toward their own tastes."
"I might venture to say that the Academy reeks of learning; a chance to learn awaits in nearly every corner of the school."

The mission of the Davidson Academy is to provide profoundly gifted young people an advanced educational opportunity matched to their abilities, strengths and interests.
Profoundly gifted students are those who score in the 99.9th percentile on IQ and achievement tests.
The Academy is a third kind of public school (not a charter school) established thanks to state legislation, Nevada Revised Statute 388C.

p.br: The Davidson Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, disability, age, marital status, sex, sexual orientation, or gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by applicable state or federal law in its programs and activities.

img.p: It is the goal of the Davidson Academy that information on this website will be accessible to individuals with disabilities. Please visit our Web Accessibility page for more information.
